choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.
Here's a healthy meal plan for you today:

Breakfast: Oatmeal with fresh fruit and nuts
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and balsamic vinaigrette
Snack: Apple slices with almond butter
Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted vegetables (broccoli, cauliflower, carrots) and brown rice

Enjoy your healthy meal plan!
